evidence.claim: Maya HealthCare utilizes FHIR for electronic health data exchange.
Claims that Maya HealthCare is HIPAA compliant and focuses on secure patient data transactions.
Integration with EHR systems is supported to ensure compliance with HL7 standards.
Maya HealthCare processes healthcare data using standard EDI transaction sets as outlined in their documentation.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transaction involvement or clearinghouse functions
